column1: 2002: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers:
:Théodred is portrayed younger than he was in the book. His death is a major event early in the movie
column4: it has all happened by the time the Three Hunters come to Rohan. He is brought heavily wounded albeit barely alive to Edoras and tended by Éowyn before dying. His burial is shown in the The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers (extended edition). Théodred was played by Paris Howe Strewe.

column1: File:The Lord of the Rings Online - Théodred.png
2011: The Lord of the Rings Online: Rise of Isengard:
:Théodred appears in Rise of Isengard and The Prince of Rohan
column2: the fourth and fifth book of Allies of the King.
